name: Block Puzzle Jewels Big Time
description:
Block Puzzle Jewels Big Gems is an exciting free time activity that will catch your eyes with unbelievable beauty and unexpected new things appearing. From now on, let’s enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game! Once you start, you will be hooked.
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all ages, but it is addictive and funny game. There are 50+ puzzles in total, the highest amount of puzzles you'll find in any game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and addicted.
